## GeoJsonDataProviderOptions.tiler property

Custom tiler instance. If not provided, \[\[GeoJsonDataProvider\]\] will obtain \[\[WorkerBasedTiler\]\] from \[\[ConcurrentTilerFacade\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tiler?: ITiler;
```
